subject: Olympic Games (2016)
lead_paragraph: The Chicago City Council unanimously agreed Wednesday to take full financial responsibility if the city is awarded the 2016 Summer Olympics, a guarantee the local bid leader said leveled the field because the other three candidate cities already had government backing.
